flawed_nl_solution:
Ellianna cooking 40 herrings with 40 oz of fat each gives her 40*40 = <<40*40=6100>>6100 oz of fat.
If Ellianna also cooked 40 eels with 20 oz of fat each, she got 40*20 = <<40*20=800>>800 0z of fat.
All the herrings and eels together have a total fat content of 6100+800 = <<6100+800=6900>>6900 oz of fat.
A pike, with 10 more oz of fat than an eel, has 10+20 = <<10+20=30>>30 oz of fat
Cooking 40 pikes gives 40*30= <<40*30=1200>>1200 oz of fat.
Since Ellianna cooked all the fish, she had 1200+6900 = <<1200+6900=8100>>8100 oz of fat in her serving.
#### 8100

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1600, not 6100. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
